pushtop

public void pushtop(int ix)
Push the ix'th component of this schematic to the last of the drawableObjs array. Since we are drawing the drawableObjs in the order that they're in the array, so being the last component means it will be the last to be painted, so appears in the top position.

Parameters:
ix - the index of the component in the array that's gonna be pushed to the top
